label: Behavior 92321264
summary: Vessel behavior pattern: navigating along a fixed route (the persistent alignment between COG and heading, combined with stable speed and negligible course deviation, indicates the vessel is following a straight, predefined maritime route; the position progression follows a linear trajectory moving eastward with a slight northerly drift, approximated by the parametric equations: lat(t) ≈ 54.687473 + 0.000132 × t, lon(t) ≈ 15.52295 + 0.00185 × t, where t is normalized time index from 0 to 1 over the observed segment)
